data.comment: Today's referee, Benoit Bastien, has blown to start the match.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 3, Nice are in shooting range from this free kick.
Amine Gouiri (Nice) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Benoit Bastien awards Nice a goal kick.
In the minute 5, PSG to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, PSG's Kylian Mbappe gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nice defender.
Corner awarded to PSG.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 10, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Nice, Kylian Mbappe of PSG is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 12, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Angel Di Maria of PSG smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 19, Nice's Morgan Schneiderlin is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Youcef Atal (Nice) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 20, Throw-in PSG.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Idrissa Gueye.
Idrissa Gueye, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Ander Herrera is the substitute for PSG.
In the minute 24, PSG have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Presnel Kimpembe of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 25, Kylian Mbappe (PSG) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Nice have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
PSG are whistled for offside.
In the minute 30, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG are pushing forward but Marco Verratti's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
In Nice Nice attack through Rony Lopes. The finish is off target, however.
PSG have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
An attacking PSG player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Kylian Mbappe gives PSG the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
In the minute 40, Free kick for PSG in the half of Nice.
So close for PSG as Ander Herrera's shot comes back off the post.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Nice.
In the minute 41, Free kick PSG.
In Nice Nice drive forward through Rony Lopes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
In the minute 43, Marco Verratti (PSG) has received a first yellow card.
Kylian Mbappe (PSG) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 44, PSG are coming forward and Presnel Kimpembe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Benoit Bastien awards Nice a goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Allianz Rivera the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Benoit Bastien blows to end the first-half.
Goal! Angel Di Maria extends PSG's lead to 0-2.
The second half has started at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for PSG at Allianz Rivera.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to PSG.
Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Nice.
In the minute 51, Nice's Amine Gouiri attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
Nice drives forward and Youcef Atal gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Nice.
Nice have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
In the minute 55, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
PSG drive upfield and Angel Di Maria gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nice defender.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 57, Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
The home team replace Kephren Thuram Ulien with Eddy Sylvestre.
In the minute 58, Patrick Vieira (Nice) is making a second substitution, with Dan Ndoye replacing Jordan Lotomba.
PSG's Mauro Icardi gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Benoit Bastien signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Nice's area.
In the minute 60, Benoit Bastien signals a Nice throw-in in PSG's half.
Pierre Lees-Melou for Nice gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
In the minute 61, Pierre Lees-Melou (Nice) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 65, PSG push forward at Allianz Rivera and Kylian Mbappe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nice defence.
Nice needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
The match at Allianz Rivera has been interrupted briefly for a check on Youcef Atal, who is down injured.
In the minute 65, Patrick Vieira (Nice) has taken off Youcef Atal who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Flavius Daniliuc is the replacement.
Free kick in a good position for PSG!
PSG move into a 0-3 lead through a Marquinhos header.
In the minute 66, Angel Di Maria with an assist there.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Nice.
Benoit Bastien awards Nice a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Evann Guessand is replacing Rony Lopes for the home team.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 74, Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In Nice, PSG push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Nice apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Evann Guessand. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 78, Goal kick for PSG at Allianz Rivera.
Benoit Bastien signals a Nice throw-in in PSG's half.
PSG have a goal kick.
Bandiougou Fadiga is on a sub for Angel Di Maria for PSG.
In the minute 79, PSG make their third substitution with Pablo Sarabia replacing Kylian Mbappe.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nice close to the penalty box.
In the minute 82, Mitchel Bakker for PSG has been booked by Benoit Bastien and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Thomas Tuchel is making the team's fourth substitution at Allianz Rivera with Colin Dagba replacing Presnel Kimpembe.
In the minute 85, Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 88, Nice pushes forward through Amine Gouiri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Nice) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Nice to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Nice have a dangerous throw-in.
Benoit Bastien will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nice's Dante misses with an attempt on goal.
Benoit Bastien awards PSG a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-3.
Dan Ndoye is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
